title: Pentuphouse
brief_description: An aging jazz singer (played with poignant resolve by Gillian Jones) must contend with her highly strung, drug using boyfriend. Director Cate Shortland traces with assured confidence the complex and delicate nuances of aging and compromise within a self destructive relationship.
